name: Rocket Maniacs
description:
Welcome to Rocket Maniacs, the most dangerous and extreme game show on the planet!

In this game show the rules are simple. The contestant will have to reach the prize money on a rocket powered hover board with a bomb strapped to his back. To keep himself alive he must keep his momentum alive or the bomb will blow up. Very simple.

In today's episode the contestant must traverse through rooftops of Neo Helsinki, the prize money is hidden high up on top of a crane. Can he keep his momentum alive or will he blow up? Stay tuned to find out! Let's get started!

The game is kind of a 3D platformer set on city rooftops. You must keep your momentum up to reach the goal.

Made with FTE QuakeWorld for Ludum Dare 46 Compo.

Controls: Mouse / Arrows to steer, W / Up to boost, S / Down to brake, Space to jump.
